system.description:
A humanoid usually has two arms, two legs, and one head, or a humanlike torso, arms, and a head. Humanoids have few or no supernatural or extraordinary abilities, but most can speak and usually have well-developed societies. They usually are Small or Medium. Every humanoid creature also has a subtype.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice (or by character class); base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good Reflex saves (usually). Humanoids with 1 HD exchange humanoid features for class features.

Traits: Humanoids breathe, eat, and sleep; proficient with simple weapons (or by character class) and with armor as described.
